homeimages.label: Create An Account
homeimages.alt: A photo of a college student wearing a yellow blouse holding a red binder.
homeimages.description: Create your free account today to start the roommate search! Fill out any information about yourself you wish to share with your potential roommate matches.

homeimages.label: Match With Potential Roommates
homeimages.alt: A group of college students laughing together around a table
homeimages.description: Be matched with potential roommates with similar lifestyles, habits, and interests. Talk with them to discover if you would be a good fit!

homeimages.label: Housing
homeimages.alt: A photo of beardshear hall from Iowa State University
homeimages.description: Discover the buildings you can live at around campus!
